comment: In a finite graph ` G ` , the set of closed walks on vertex ` X ` of length ` N ` is also finite. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-Sep-2018.) (Revised by AV, 25-Feb-2022.) (Proof shortened by AV, 24-Mar-2022.)
